data.name: Hypogean
data.detailed_description:
Hypogean is a relaxed digging simulation which takes place in a neon, sci-fi underground city named Hypogea. The player is hired as the newest miner of Hypogea, an expert in wielding the so called “drilling machine.”

Your goal is to mine ores, return them to the city, turn them in for cash, upgrade your drilling machine, and then repeat. Plain and simple. Hypogea corporation offers a wide variety of upgrades to your machinery, so that your mining endeavors become much more enjoyable, efficient, and interesting. Oh, there are also bombs so you can blow stuff up to your heart’s content.

Explore different underground biomes, based on real-life, hypogean biotopes.
Find hidden and forgotten technology that previous miners left behind.
Unearth ancient valuables covered under tons of dirt and rock.

Key Features Of The Game:
- Explore a procedually generated level.



- Discover and excavate different kind of ores.



- Combine ores to create different kind of alloys and metals.



- Sell your findings for money to upgrade your driller.



- Customize your driller to your liking with cosmetics you find in the caves.

data.short_description: Welcome to the world of Hypogean, a casual mining simulation where you will be tasked with mining valuables for Hypogea, a mining corporation. Your main task is to operate a drilling machine and delve into the caves in search of ore, minerals, and other rare collectibles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: x64-compatible, 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 TI or equivalent
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
